statement: Prove that the fraction (21n + 4)/(14n + 3) is irreducible for every natural number n.
For what real values of x does √(x + √(2x - 1)) + √(x - √(2x - 1)) = A hold for (a) A = √2, (b) A = 1, (c) A = 2, admitting only non-negative square roots?
Given a quadratic equation a cos²x + b cos x + c = 0, form a quadratic equation in cos 2x with the same roots. Compare the two equations for a = 4, b = 2, c = -1.
Construct a right triangle with given hypotenuse c such that the median to the hypotenuse is the geometric mean of the two legs.

Point M is chosen inside segment AB. Squares AMCD and MBEF are built on the same side of AB; their circumcircles (centers P, Q) intersect at M and N. Let N′ be the intersection of lines AF and BC. (a) Prove N = N′. (b) Prove line MN passes through a fixed point S independent of M. (c) Find the locus of the midpoints of PQ as M moves from A to B.

Planes P and Q intersect along line p. Point A lies in P and point C in Q, neither on p. Construct an isosceles trapezoid ABCD (AB || CD) that admits an inscribed circle, with vertices B and D lying in planes P and Q respectively.
